topic.title: Actions Available at Table Level in Data Source Explorer View

body.p: The contextual menu of a Table node of the tree from the Data Source Explorer view contains the following actions:

ul.li: Refresh - Performs a refresh of the selected node's subtree.
Edit - Opens the selected table in the Table Explorer view.
Export to XML - Opens the Export Criteria dialog (a thorough description of this dialog can be found in the Import from Database chapter) .
